text: When Knights Were Bold is a 1908 American silent movie directed by Wallace McCutcheonWhen Knights Were BoldWHEN KNIGHTS WERE BOLD and stars Linda Arvidson, D. W. Griffith, and Harry Solter. ==Actors== *Linda Arvidson *D. W. Griffith *Harry Solter *Eddie Dillon *May Robson ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 movies Category:American silent movies Category:Short movies Category:Movies directed by Wallace McCutcheon Sr.
title: When Knights Were Bold (1908 movie)
